misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his fifth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his flamboyant style and occasional back problems, Okko is always a player to watch.
His singular focus and dedication to the sport have made him a formidable opponent. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on one occasion, proving his mettle in the pairs format.

Off the course, Okko is a gregarious character with a penchant for celebration. In fact, the phenomenon affectionately dubbed 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition during a past Hector event, a testament to his exuberant spirit. It remains to be seen if Okko will be able to repeat his past successes.
